Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing near the area of Harlem/Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing near the area of Harlem/Lake due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
